title.rendered: STEDI UNIVERSAL TYPE A LED FOG LIGHT CONVERSION KIT

content.rendered:
STEDI’s new Type A Universal LED Fog Light is designed to replace your factory fog lights to a brighter beam with better fog penetration for much more visibility.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

If you’re looking for an OEM like LED upgrade, look no further down our Type A fog light which has mounting brackets to suit a wide range of factory fog lamp housing.

The projector lens optic distributes a very flat and extremely wide pattern which is DOT and ECE standard compliant for road use.

Once installed we recommend that the beam is adjusted to ensure that it cuts off no higher than 50cm from the ground, with the car 25m away from a wall. 

Please check below for a full list of compatible vehicles. 

COMPATIBLE VEHICLES

CITROEN

  • DS5: 2012 – 2017
  • DS4: 2011
  • BERLINGO: 2012 – 2017
  • C-CROSSER: 2007 – 2017
  • C4: 2004 -2009
  • C4 PICASSO: 2006 – 2007
  • C4 PICASSO: 2011
  • C5: 2001 – 2007
  • C-QUATRE: 2009

FORD

  • C-MAX: 2010 – 2017
  • ECOSPORT: 2013 – 2017
  • EXPLORER: 2011 – 2015
  • FIESTA: WQ – WP 1/2004 – 8/2008 including XR4
  • FOCUS:  LT 5/2007 – 3/2009 Fits XXR5 from 2/2008 to 12/2011
  • FREESTYLE: 2005 – 2007
  • FALCON FG: Series 2/2008 – 2013 (XT, XR6, XR8, G6 & G6E)  
  • TERRITORY SZ: 6/2011 – 2013 (Excluding Titanium Model)
  • FUSION: 2014 – 2017
  • MUSTANG: 2015 – 2017
  • RANGER: PX1 + PX2  2012 – Current (Not including Wildtrak PX2)
  • TAURUS X: 2008 – 2009
  • TRANSIT: 2/2006 onwards
  • TRANSIT CONNECT: 2011 – 2013

HOLDEN

  • COMMODORE: VE 6/2006 to 9/2010 (Series 1)

  • TRITON: 2010 – present

  • JUKE: 2010 – 2014
  • MURANO: 2008 – 2014
  • NV200: 2010 – 2017
  • PATROL: 2004 – 2009
  • PATROL: 2010 – 2017

  • LEAF: 2011 – 2017

  • 2013-2014 Subaru Forester

  • 2010-2012 Subaru Outback

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Alloy Heat Sink
LED Luxeon T LED
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
CERTIFICATION CE, E4, RoHs, R87, IP67
FOG LIGHT DRAW 0.8a @ 13.6v
DIAMETER 90mm

OEM PART NO#

26150-89906-21 / 26150-8993B /26150-8990B / 26150-8992B / 26150-8994B

51858824 / 9670955280 / 33900-STK-A11
R: 33900-TY0-003 + L: 33950-TY0-003

84501-FJ000 / SU003-02518 / A4158200356 /
26150-3NA0A / 84503-FJ000 / 8321A36 / 6208Q3

8321A034 / 8321A144 / MN142091 / LR001587 / 6208F9
R: 8321A902 + L: 8321A901

26150-3XA0A / 26155-00Q0A / 26150-VD30A
35500-63J00 / 35500-63J02 / 5500-63J03
8200074008 / 5001874722 / 8321A097 / 4709052 / 088358
1209177 / 1209077 / 6710027 / 620662 / 620639 / 6206E1
UC2T51680 / 4F9Z 15200 AA

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x STEDI Universal Type A Fog Lights
  • Fasteners Included
